Class Soldier

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Entity
        • Soldier
  • public abstract class Soldier
extends Entity
    The soldier is a moving entity that has special possess various attack abilities depending on its type. There are 4 types of soldiers: Bandit, BeefyBandit, Healer and Knight
    Version:
    April 28th, 2022
    Author:
    Benny Wu, Angus, Caleb

    • Constructor Detail

      • Soldier

        public Soldier​(int direction,
               int maxHp)
        The superclass for all the NPC's inside the game. They share common features such as attacking, dying, getting hit, having health bars, etc. Hence, we put them under the Soldier class.
